text: Pavel Řehák (born October 7, 1963) is a former Czech football player. Following his playing career, Řehák became a manager. He was assistant manager for Vissel Kobe before taking on the manager role in June 2005. ==Club statistics== Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup J.League Cup J.League Cup Total Total 1991–92 Furukawa Electric JSL Division 1 22 8 0 0 22 8 1992 JEF United Ichihara J1 League - 9 3 9 3 1993 31 16 3 3 5 3 39 22 1994 16 1 0 0 1 0 17 1 1995 Toshiba Football League 23 11 1 0 - 24 11 1996 Consadole Sapporo Football League 16 5 3 1 - 19 6 1999 Yokohama FC Football League 20 8 3 4 - 23 12 Total Total Total 128 49 10 8 15 6 153 64 ==Managerial statistics== J.League Data Site Team From To Record G W D L Win % Vissel Kobe 2005 2005 Total ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Czech footballers Category:Czech football managers
